original_text: That is why a man leaves his father and mother and is united to his wife, and they become one flesh.
korean_text: 이러므로 남자가 부모를 떠나 그의 아내와 합하여 둘이 한 몸을 이룰지로다

sentences.original_text: a man leaves his father and mother
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자가 그의 아버지와 어머니를 떠납니다

sentences.original_text: and is united to his wife
